scripts.check:fit: npm run build && node scripts/check-fit.mjs slides.md
scripts.check:fit:perception: npm run build:perception && node scripts/check-fit.mjs slides-perception-color.md
scripts.check:fit:webviz: npm run build:webviz && node scripts/check-fit.mjs slides-python-webviz.md
scripts.check:fit:interactive: npm run build:interactive && node scripts/check-fit.mjs slides-python-interactive-dash.md
scripts.inspect:webviz: npm run build:webviz && node scripts/inspect-slides.mjs slides-python-webviz.md dist inspect
scripts.inspect:interactive: npm run build:interactive && node scripts/inspect-slides.mjs slides-python-interactive-dash.md dist inspect
